snippet: Abigail Hansen writes, "I feel so done with everything remotely related to high school right now, so I wonder how I will get any passion for education back for college."
abstract: Abigail Hansen writes, "I feel so done with everything remotely related to high school right now, so I wonder how I will get any passion for education back for college."

headline.main: 'So Done' With School, and Anxious About College
